biotools.summary: Model to detect and classify relations in text, representing each entity  of domain-specific ontologies as the sequence of its ancestors in the ontology. BO-LSTM is implemented as a recurrent neural network with long short-term memory units and using open biomedical ontologies.

bioschemas.name: BO-LSTM
bioschemas.summary: Model to detect and classify relations in text, representing each entity  of domain-specific ontologies as the sequence of its ancestors in the ontology. BO-LSTM is implemented as a recurrent neural network with long short-term memory units and using open biomedical ontologies.
